net.jsourcerer.webdriver.jserrorcollector
Class JavaScriptError

java.lang.Object
  net.jsourcerer.webdriver.jserrorcollector.JavaScriptError

public class JavaScriptError
extends java.lang.Object

Holds information about a JavaScript error that has occurred in the browser. This can be currently only used with the FirefoxDriver (see addExtension(FirefoxProfile).

Version:
$Revision: $
Author:
Marc Guillemot

readErrors

public static java.util.List<JavaScriptError> readErrors(org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
Gets the collected JavaScript errors that have occurred since last call to this method.

Parameters:
driver - the driver providing the possibility to retrieved JavaScript errors (see addExtension(FirefoxProfile).
Returns:
the errors or an empty list if the driver doesn't provide access to the JavaScript errors

addExtension

public static void addExtension(org.openqa.selenium.firefox.FirefoxProfile ffProfile)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Adds the Firefox extension collecting JS errors to the profile what allows later use of readErrors(WebDriver).

Example:

 final FirefoxProfile profile = new FirefoxProfile();
 JavaScriptError.addExtension(profile);
 final WebDriver driver = new FirefoxDriver(profile);

Parameters:
ffProfile - the Firefox profile to which the extension should be added.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - in case of problem
